bibl.title: Depot Orders No. 580 from A.A. Stewart, September 14, 1918

div1.p: Moran is assigned to the Clothing and Equipage Division.

div1.head: Depot Orders No. 580 from A.A. Stewart, September 14, 1918
div1.p:
1. Captain John J. Moran, Q.M.C., is hereby relieved
from his present duties in the Stores & Warehousing Division
and assigned to duty in the Inspection Branch, Clothing & Equipage
Division.
div1.closer:
By authority of the Depot Quartermaster: A.A. STEWART,
Captain, Q. M. Corps. BY:
LEWIS T. APPLE,
2nd Lt., Q. M. Corps.
L-W-O
Copy for Capt Moran
